Sept. 10, 1938 D Yorkshire Transport Contest
Yorkshire Transport Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
yorkshire-transport-contest
None
Mignonne
Town Hall, Dewsbury, West Yorkshire March contest - 1st Hepworth, 2nd Salts. Promoted by Yorkshire Transport Band. Musical Progress and Mail gives test piece as Mignonne, Brass Band News gives it as Le Regina di Golconda. 5 bands competed.
March 24, 2013, 11:49 p.m. March 19, 2017, 3:07 p.m.
1 Salt's Saltaire Herbert Bowdin Hawley
2 Birstall Old H. Smith
3 Batley Old Harold Kemp
Unknown Result Hepworth Band Willie Kaye
Unknown Result Upton W.M.C. Unknown
